article: New Year's Day is coming. I believe that most of you have your own New Year's resolutions. But what kind of resolutions should you  _  ? First, your New Year's resolutions should be  _  for you. Be sure that they can  _  your studies or make you healthier. "Going to bed later" is not a good resolution. It is not good for your health. You should make resolutions like "drinking milk for  _  every morning." The resolution "  _  eating junk food" is also a good one. Studying harder and spending  _  time watching TV are also good ones. Second, your New Year's resolutions should not be very  _  to keep. Be sure that you can keep your resolutions. Don't make your resolutions too  _  . Flying to the moon is a difficult resolution for  _  . You should keep your resolutions small and simple,  _  you can keep them. After you make some good and realistic resolutions, don't forget to make a plan . Write down what you need to do every day, and then do it.
